text: 3:8 Ua Me Ini 7:11; Rom 1:28; 2 Korin 13:5; 1 Timoti 6:5; 2 Timoti 2:25Fomɨra Janes ko Jambres aning Mosesɨn apanimɨn iti moghɨn, gumazir kaba guizɨn akamɨn apanim gami. Ezɨ men nɨghnɨziba deragha ingarir puvatɨzɨma me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨ.3:8 Judaba kamaghɨn eghara ghaze, Janes ko Jambres, kar Mosesɨn dughiamɨn ikezir Isipɨn Atrivimɨn ganganir gumazimningɨn ziamning. Nɨ Ua Me Ini 7:22 ko 9:11ɨn gan.
